name: Demolition Imminent
description:
Player VS Player. Brother against brother. Fight to the death. Control a gang of 4 zany characters.

Made for Scary Lemon's "LISA Jam Gaiden" in just 1 month out of 3 allotted (not as a challenge, but due to decision paralysis). This proof of concept can be further developed and refined.

Based on LISA: The Painful. Inspired by Darkest Dungeon: Butcher's Circus.

ATTENTION! The project is very rushed and WIP, prone to bugs and desynchronization. Please report all issues in either of these two servers, or in itch comments.

https://discord.gg/HMUuCJbQyx

https://discord.gg/rMV55Kcrb5?event=1060630490673057832
